articles.author: Rob McLean and Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: Asia markets sink as tensions between Ukraine and Russia climb - CNN
articles.description: Markets across Asia tumbled on Tuesday morning as tensions between Ukraine and Russia continued to escalate.

articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Asia-Pacific shares slide as tensions between Russia and Ukraine escalate; oil prices surge - CNBC
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered forces into two breakaway regions of eastern Ukraine, following a Monday announcement that he would recognize their independence.
articles.content:

articles.title: Neanderthal gene could explain why some ethnic groups suffer worse from Covid than others - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Around half of South Asians, who were at greater risk during the pandemic, carry a mutation of the genes compared to one-fifth of Europeans
articles.content:
Neanderthal genes which protected people from smallpox could be the reason some ethnic groups are more at risk from Covid, a new study suggests.
